There was another torrent called Back.to.the.Future.The.Game.Episode.2.Get.Tannen.RIP-Unleashed by user raafaell on the pirate bay. I downloaded and installed it. A few hours later I found trojans and a rootkit on my computer. I suspect that torrent was behind it. When i look for it now it's no longer on the pirate bay. Are my suspicions correct and did it contain malware?
Many internets to the uploader!

@Necessity: It was a fake torrent. Get this one. 
Next time make sure you check comments, quality meter at the top of the page (currently +10) and if it's a trusted uploader (pink skull icon).
thaNKS i have BEEN wAITIN for this !!!!

Looks like 	Back.to.the.Future.The.Game.Episode.2.Get.Tannen.RIP-Unleashed is a 0Day release which isn't nuked yet (as per my knowledge). But if there's any malware in that release, it should be nuked soon.

Rest assured, this torrent is perfectly fine and clean.

Much appreciated to anyone who knows how to fix this...

I will deem who ever can get a working copy of this game on here a GOD ;) Ive only been able to find this same file on all the torrent sites I know, and all of them have comments about hearing Marty and Doc but not being able to see any animation. So def looks like its not my comp and something is wrong with this file.. PLEASE SOMEONE PUT UP A DIFFERENT ONE.. Thanks :)
Thanks :)
@Chadly   Try turning down the graphic detail settings.  Mines works on setting 2 because I don't have a graphic card. Anything higher than that and I get a black screen.
